com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp

Class ATTPDPEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.ATTPDPEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PDPEngine, Traceable

    public class ATTPDPEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements PDPEngine, Traceable
    ATTPDPEngine implements the PDPEngine interface using the XACML 3.0 specification.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response decide(Request pepRequest)
      Evaluates the given Request using this PDPEngine's Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.
      Traceable getCause()
      Gets the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called.
      java.util.Collection<java.net.URI> getProfiles()
      Gets the Collection of URIs that represent the profiles supported by this PDPEngine.
      java.lang.String getTraceId()
      Gets the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent as a result of a policy evaluation method.
      boolean hasProfile(java.net.URI uriProfile)
      Determines if this PDPEngine supports the given URI profile.

      • getTraceId

        public java.lang.String getTraceId()
        Description copied from interface: Traceable
        Gets the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent as a result of a policy evaluation method. Implementations must not return null.
        Specified by:
        getTraceId in interface Traceable
        Returns:
        the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent.

      • getCause

        public Traceable getCause()
        Description copied from interface: Traceable
        Gets the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called. If there is no known causing object, this method should return null.
        Specified by:
        getCause in interface Traceable
        Returns:
        the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called.
